We are delighted to welcome [Jeff Guo](https://twitter.com/JeffGuo__) as a PhD student! He will be part of our NCCR Catalysis team.

![](image.jpg)

Jeff Guo recently completed the grad program at AstraZeneca, where he was working on reinforcement learning for molecular design. Before that he received a MRes in Drug Discovery and Development from Imperial College London 
and BSc in Chemistry from the McGill University.

For a list of all his publication you can check out his [Google Scholar profile](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=yzhfk_YAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao)
